Description: Flint flake, triangular in shape, with slight retouch on one side. Cortex remaining at the wider end.
Curator's comments: One of 5 flint artifacts mentioned as present in grave 5104 by the excavator: see also EA 59644-47,
Bibliographic references: Brunton & Caton-Thompson 1928 / The Badarian Civilisation and Predynastic Remains near Badari (pl. v) (tomb register)
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
